title: My mom is Peruvian, my dad in Guatema, and I was born in America. What am I? Am I American Peruvian? - Quora

response.answer_text: Peru and Guatemalan are also in America, America is a continent that goes from Alaska and Canada in the north to Argentina and Chile in the south. But you get 3 nationalities, US citizen, Peruvian and Guatemaltecan.
